name: Slain (GCRagnarok)
description:
I created this game using UE4 during my second year of studying games development at college. The theme for this project was medieval, so I wanted to create a medieval themed combat focused action game.

Dev Log: https://sites.google.com/d/1pwfwS7XQkXq-kQitEhSnXsDEXFtggQzZ/p/1MSRH0l3f8-2fLS_TKeZL8hsFxS604DVm/edit
